text: Eat Bulaga! formerly Eat... Bulaga!, is a Philippine television variety show broadcast by GMA Network. It is the longest running variety show in the Philippines, with over 13,000 episodes. Originally hosted by Tito Sotto, Vic Sotto, Joey de Leon, Chiqui Hollman and Richie D'Horsie, it premiered on Radio Philippines Network on July 30, 1979. The show was originally produced by Production Specialists, Inc., until TAPE Inc. took over its production on July 7, 1981. ==History== On March 9, 2020, APT Studios we're suspended due to the COVID-19 pandemic. ==Notes== == References == Category:1970s establishments in the Philippines Category:1979 establishments in Asia Category:1979 television series debuts Category:Philippine television series Category:Quezon City
title: Eat Bulaga!
